title: Ukraine Hacks Russia’s Aviation Agency, Claims “Aviation Cannibalism”
description:
By Deeba Ahmed

In a press release, Ukraine’s intelligence agency referred to the hacking as a “successful complex special operation in cyberspace.” 

This is a post from HackRead.com Read the original post: Ukraine Hacks Russia’s Aviation Agency, Claims “Aviation Cannibalism”

title: Google Workspace Vulnerable to Takeover Due to Domain-Wide Delegation Flaw, Warns Cybersecurity Firm Hunters
description:
By Owais Sultan

Dubbed "DeleFriend," the vulnerability enables attackers to manipulate GCP and Google Workspace delegations without needing the high-privilege Super Admin role on Workspace.

This is a post from HackRead.com Read the original post: Google Workspace Vulnerable to Takeover Due to Domain-Wide Delegation Flaw, Warns Cybersecurity Firm Hunters

title: Ethyrial: Echoes of Yore Hit by Ransomware, Player Accounts Deleted
description:
By Deeba Ahmed

The victim company, Gellyberry Studios, an independent game studio, developed Ethyrial: Echoes of Yore.

This is a post from HackRead.com Read the original post: Ethyrial: Echoes of Yore Hit by Ransomware, Player Accounts Deleted
